tags.description:
Smart little coffee shop, smoothies, little snacks, vegan cakes.
Owners George & Genny are very friendly.
Funny interior.
tags.name: Café George

tags.description: Greek cuisine. Fresh fish and live lobster.
tags.name: Taverna Limani

tags.description: Located in Ano Mathraki village just beside the small church of St Spiridon you will find the traditional local Kafenion “Kentro”. They serve drinks at very reasonable prices and on some summer evenings charcoal grilled souvlaki or lamb.
tags.name: Kentro Kafenion
Porto Timoni Restaurant & Porto Timoni Apartments
